<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales Marketing Executive

Location: Galveston, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Why you should work with Best Version Media?
BVM is bringing people together across the U.S. and Canada. Our award-winning culture has been recognized by countless organizations!
Are you ready to take charge of your potential? Apply to learn about the turnkey business model that provides work/life balance, flexible scheduling (no evenings or weekends needed!), a road map to financial goals, and benefits the businesses and residents in your local community.
BVM is announced as one of the "Best and Brightest Companies to Work for in the Nation" (Feb 12th, 2024 - The Wall Street Journal)!
Revenue potential:
Each BVM magazine can carry approximately $500,000 in print advertising revenue.
Selling digital ad products vastly increases your revenue potential.
COMMISSIONS: Industry-high commission levels will be discussed during the interview stage.
Year one earnings can range from $50,000 to $100,000 with full-time effort.
Year two earnings can reach $150,000 to $250,000+.
BONUSES: Substantial start-up bonuses are available.
Embrace an inviting work culture and flexible schedule:
Experience a humility-based work culture that fosters growth and collaboration.
Enjoy the freedom of a flexible work schedule with control over your time.
No need for evenings or weekends.
Thrive as a BVM Publisher with unique benefits:
BVM places only one Publisher per market.
Benefit from over 1,200 publications across North America.
Leverage our powerful advertising platform to create impactful campaigns for local businesses.
Garnered over 3 billion digital impressions in 2023.
Utilize multi-channel digital and print branding programs for local businesses.
Access micro-targeted print magazines and digital advertising.
Capitalize on advertising opportunities with our BVM Sports website.
Earn substantial and immediate bonuses based on met qualifications.
Work as an independent contractor from the comfort of your home office.
Receive professional training, coaching, and unlimited support.
Focus on promoting the good in the community, featuring neighbors, events, news, and local sports.
Teach small business owners to adopt successful strategies from big brands (TOMA).
Successful Publishers will have the following:
Reliable transportation, laptop, and internet connectivity.
A phone for effective communication, presentation, and ad agreement purposes.
Let's see if this could be a fit for you!
About Best Version Media:
Recent BVM Awards:
Glassdoor's Best Places to Work (2023)Great Place to Work Certified (2020 - 2023)Top Workplaces USA (2021, 2022 & 2023)Company of the Year - Advertising, Marketing & PR (CEO World Awards; 2021 & 2022)CEO of the Year, Kevin O'Brien - Advertising, Marketing & PR (CEO World Awards; 2022)Executive of the Year, Kevin O'Brien - Advertising, Marketing & PR (CEO World Awards, 2022)Best New Product, Service or Solution of the Year, BVM Sports (CEO World Awards; 2021)Employer of the Year - Advertising, Marketing & PR (Stevie Awards; 2020, 2022)Fastest-Growing Company of the Year (Best in Biz; 2020 & 2021)Most Resilient Company of the Year (Best in Biz; 2021)Milwaukee's Best and Brightest Companies to Work For (NABR; 2020, 2021 & 2022)Top Workplaces (Milwaukee Journal Sentinel; 2020, 2021 & 2022)Best Places to Work (Milwaukee Business Journal; 2020 & 2021)American Inhouse Design Awards (GDUSA; 2020 - 2023)Graphics Excellence Awards (Great Lakes Graphics Association; 2020, 2021 & 2022)American Graphic Design Awards (GDUSA; 2021)Future 50 Awards (BizTimes Media; 2022 & 2023)

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
